feed.title: Less is better: Finally an interesting 3D desktop prototype
feed.subtitle: John Lam on software

entry.title: Finally an interesting 3D desktop prototype
entry.summary: My desk contains piles of stuff. Your desk probably contains piles of stuff too. See how an innovative user interface takes advantage of our tendancy to organize small to medium amounts of data in piles.
entry.content: My desk contains piles of stuff. Your desk probably contains piles of stuff too. See how an innovative user interface takes advantage of our tendancy to organize small to medium amounts of data in piles.

entry.title: Comment on Finally an interesting 3D desktop prototype by Dan S.
entry.content: The rap summary was hilarious as well!

entry.title: Comment on Finally an interesting 3D desktop prototype by Jeff
entry.content:
Quite cool. Now if they could just remove 80% of it :-)

Interesting possibilites enter my mind if I could manipulate the desktop of a Tablet PC this way. I think this demo shows the potential to take pen input devices to the next level.

Thanks for the link.
